names.english: formula to invigorate the blood and break up stasis
names.commonEnglish: Formula to Invigorate the Blood and Break up Stasis

actions: Invigorates the Blood and promotes the movement of Qi.
Invigorates nourishes and cools the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood and expels Blood Stasis.
Extinguishes Wind, alleviates spasms, drains Liver Heat, pacifies Liver Yang and releases the Exterior.
Expels Wind, eliminates Dampness, dispels Cold and alleviates pain.
With Jiang Can, for frontal headache.
Extinguishes Wind and stops spasms and convulsions.

symptoms: Heaviness of the body and joints
Preference of the joints for warmth
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white or Thin, white and greasy
